channel.title: Skillcape EMOTES not Working right
channel.description: Okay my skill cape emotes do not want to work. The gfxs work pefctly, but the emotes just go all crazy and stuff. Any fix please? Are there any files needed for the EMOTES I have the GFXs working fine. [url=http://pastebin.com/w0FzzNLp]http://pastebin.com/w0FzzNLp[/url]
